name: DodgeSaw (Bad Piggy)
description:
DodgeSaw is a 3D-ish dodgeball bullet hell which rewards you for being risky.

Made for the Discroomgamejam

Controls:

Arrow keys : movement

Z : Throw a disc

X : Dodge roll  ( You are invulnerable to discs while rolling )
